text.tspan: - For a Futures trade, contract code, maturity date and price are critical
- For Options, contract code, maturity date, call or put and strike price details are
- Cash and positions validations are done as part of this activity
- All Customer and Broker level Commissions and Charges get defaulted based
on Charge Tax Type for Dx.trade activity if set in
SC.CHARGE.TAX.CALC.CREATE else calculated based on DX.COMMISSION
or can be a manual input.
- Maturity date of underlying futures, if applicable, gets defaulted in market price key

rect.style: fill: none; stroke-opacity: 0; stroke: white; stroke-width: 15px;

polyline.style: fill: none; stroke: black; stroke-width: 2px; stroke-dasharray: 0.5, 5; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round;
fill: none; stroke-opacity: 0; stroke: white; stroke-width: 15px;

path.style: fill: black; stroke-width: 1px; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dasharray: 10000, 1; stroke: black;
